instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00687: What is 820-00687? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1534: What is A1534? A1534 is a model number for a 12 inch size Macbook  from years 2015, 2016 with EMC 2746, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00045, 820-00244..
definitions.820-00244: What is 820-00244? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00687</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> resistor vsalue
threads.message: Hi, i have <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2017n after water damage, there is only little wtr damage near cpu. Please help with value.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00687</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> resistor vsalue
threads.message:
[QUOTE="mobajer, post: 40079"]Hi, i have <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2017n after water damage, there is only little wtr damage near cpu. Please help with value.[/QUOTE]

Can't you use the <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> .brd fpr that?
